images.name: Customa Default
images.creator: Customa Team
images.code:
:root{
  --ColAppBG: #161616; /* Color or url('link to image')*/
  --ColAuthBG: url('/assets/fd91131ea693096d6be5e8aa99d18f9e.jpg');
  --ColBackground1: var(--ColAppBG); /* Color */
  --ColBackground2: #212121; /* Color */
  --ColAccent: #D81B60; /* Color */
  --ColAccentAlpha: rgba(216, 27, 96, 0.1); /* Color in RGBA Format,
  best when hex code of --ColAccent is converted to rgba and get's an opacity of 0.1 */
  --ColAnchor: #0096cf;  /* Color */
  --ColLastMessage: transparent; /* Transparent or Color - pref. RGBA color */
  --ColFalse: #F44336; /* Color */
  --ColTrue: #8BC34A; /* Color */
  --DisplayEmbedPill: none; /* Block or none */
  --DisplayNoConnectionBackdraw: flex; /* Flex or none */
}
